description.value: You've learned to unleash the anger and malice you've built up over the course of your life and restless undeath against multiple foes at once, creating a potent effect around yourself. You can choose to use Baleful Gaze as a 2-action activity, rather than 1. When you do, Baleful Gaze gains the divine trait, loses the visual trait, and affects each living creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30], rather than a single living creature.
